summary: All requirements from the BuildRequest have been implemented. REQ-9 adds the 'isInstant' boolean field to the Product type in backend/main.mo and includes migration logic. REQ-10 is partially addressed by the migration setting isInstant to false by default, but the BuildRequest specifically requires all dairy products to have isInstant set to true, which is not evident from the diff. REQ-11 is fully implemented with an 'Instant' badge displayed on ProductCard using a lightning icon (Zap) and earthy accent styling.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update all existing dairy products in the product catalog to have instant delivery enabled (isInstant = true)
missing_requirements.reason: The migration.mo file sets isInstant = false by default for all existing products. There is no evidence in the diff of any code that sets isInstant = true for the dairy products (milk, curd, paneer, butter, ghee). The acceptance criteria requires all products to have isInstant set to true.

missing_requirements.requirement: Products can be queried to filter by instant delivery availability
missing_requirements.reason: No query function or filtering capability for instant delivery products is implemented in backend/main.mo. The getAvailableProducts() function only filters by 'available' status, not by 'isInstant' field.
